item.title: The Shavian Alphabet
item.description: Something to learn someday: # I just rediscovered the Shavian writing system.

item.title: Thirty Years
item.description: I just realized… # It’s been thirty years since my first website which I built in 1994.

item.title: New Theme
item.description: New Theme - Blowfish # I’ve decided to change the theme to blowfish.

item.title: Org-Mode does it all
item.description: Org really does it all # Someone on Hacker News posted a link yesterday to a productivity directory of apps for, of all things, productivity.

item.title: Social Media Annoyances
item.description: Facebook is trying to get my attention # I haven’t been on social media in years.

item.title: Early Spring Cleaning
item.description: Time to Get Shit Done(tm) # It’s time for an early spring cleaning.

item.title: Old People and Phones
item.description: Old people and phones # Somebody really needs to start a global program to teach old people that the one thing they should never do is hold their telephone up to their ear when a person video calls them.

item.title: Happy 2024 and more
item.description: Happy New Year # I haven’t written here in donkey’s years.

item.title: There Are No Kings in Rome
item.description: There Are No Kings in Rome # I have been utterly aghast at the discourse in the media over the last two years in regards to Trump.

item.title: ChatGPT Dungeons & Dragons
item.description: ChatGPT Dungeons & Dragons # As a fun little experiment last night, I had ChatGPT write out a little Dungeons and Dragons adventure.

item.description: In any other democracy… # Living here in France, as I do, it is extremely difficult to explain to the French that the United States is a society based upon civilized laws and a democracy.
